title: U.S. online shopping frequency 2014 to 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 32.0 is found at Response Once or more per month and the minimum is found at Never where Share of respondents is 4.0.
There is a difference of 28.0 between the maximum Response Once or more per month and minimum Response Never.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Once or more per month has the highest Share of respondents and Never has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 32.0 is found at Response Once or more per month and the minimum is found at Never where Share of respondents is 4.0.
There is a difference of 28.0 between the maximum Response Once or more per month and minimum Response Never.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Once or more per month and lowest at Response Never.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response .
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 28.0.
Response Once or more per month is higher than any other Responses with value 32.0, followed by , and 7-12 times per year. Down to Response Never with the lowest value 4.0.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 6 Responses is roughly 16.67.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
